Tinkering involves materials from many other trades.
Tinkerers use a special knife-like tool and stationary tinker workbenches to craft their clever devices.
The base components of all tinkered items are built from metal ingots. The metals involved are copper, bronze, iron, silver and gold.
Wires require 2 ingots.
Gearsets require 3 ingots.
Widgets require a gearset, 2 wires and 4 ingots.
Alchemy packs require the appropriate essence, a cured small leather hide (badger sized) and a copper wire.
Traps require 2 widgets and a wire of the proper metal. They may also require an alchemy pack.
Weak spike and tangle traps require copper. Weak fire, shocking, acid and frost require bronze. Medium traps all require iron. Strong spike and tangle traps use silver and the rest of the strong traps use gold.
Devices require a mixture of different components.
